top.subTitle: Create your own card!!!
top.yourOnlyCardTitle: Create your own card and battle
top.yourOnlyCardSentence: You can create cards using your own blockchain game's images.
top.sellYourCardSentence: Your created cards can be used and traded on Dappsmaket.
top.whatIsDappsSentence: Blockchain games are games that choose blockchain as database. They have some pros such as data permanency (data is not lost when game service ends or under maintenance) and data transparency (players can verify fraud) etc.
top.strengthSentence: Although data remains after DApp service ended, it is useless if there is no place to use. This game is the place to use the data even if the service ended, as well as a platform for creators who would like to sell cards with their own images.
top.storySentence: Card games are always created plenty in this world. Suddenly, oneday, images on cards disappear. You come up with alternatives based on blockchain’s images...
top.makeCardSentence: You can create card by combining frame (of card that lost image) and image
top.makeDeckSentence: You can create deck which contains 40 cards from your created cards.
top.battleSentence: Your favorite characters are all over the screen!!!
top.companyName: Copyright © 2019 on the rock Co., Ltd./Bacoor Inc. All rights reserved.

market.preSale1Text: We sell following frames for a limited time。
market.preSale4Header: 4th presale: frame c battle ✕ kurate gakuen
